body_html:
@Carmezim Yeah I suppose you are right. Nvidia's docs were pretty confusing though;

The whole Visual Studio project and linker etc were instructions were really confusing. Maybe I should email them.

`WINDOWS

Add <installpath> to the PATH environment variable.

In your Visual Studio project properties, add <installpath> to the Include Directories 
and Library Directories lists and add cudnn.lib to Linker->Input->Additional Dependencies.`

Anyway, thank you so much for working with me until I got it working. I really appreciate it.

body:
@Carmezim   Yeah I suppose you are right. Nvidia's docs were pretty confusing though;

The whole Visual Studio project and linker etc were instructions were really confusing.  Maybe I should email them. 

`WINDOWS

    Add <installpath> to the PATH environment variable.

    In your Visual Studio project properties, add <installpath> to the Include Directories 
    and Library Directories lists and add cudnn.lib to Linker->Input->Additional Dependencies.`


Anyway, thank you so much for working with me until I got it working.  I really appreciate it.
